useCase.name: Generate Fault Management Report

preconditions.precondition: The Buyer/Client has access to the Fault Management System.

successEndConditions.condition: The Fault Management Report is successfully generated and delivered to the Buyer/Client.

useCase.trigger: Buyer/Client requests the generation of a Fault Management Report.

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request to create a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job enters the 'inProgress' state.
Data is generated for the Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Report enters the 'inProgress' state.
Data is collected for the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Job is marked as completed.
Buyer/Client requests the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report content is delivered to the Buyer/Client.
